title: South Boston 5 bedroom available 9/1
posting_body: Large Penthouse 5 bedroom unit with bonus room!
This apartment has two floors of living space.
The main level has a spacious open kitchen, living and dining room area; access to private deck, full bathroom and one bedroom.
The top floor has 4 bedrooms; 2nd full bathroom; and deck off of the master bedroom.
In unit amenities include: in unit laundry; hardwood flooring; central a/c; modern kitchen and bathrooms.
Close to East Broadway's shops and restaurants; Seaport; public transportation; M Street Beach and more!
Text Gina to schedule a showing
